org.aopalliance.aop
Interface Advice

All Known Subinterfaces:
AfterReturning, BeanInstantiationInterceptor, BeforeAdvice, ConstructorInterceptor, FieldInterceptor, InstantiationInterceptor, Interceptor, MethodBeforeAdvice, MethodInterceptor, ThrowsAdvice<T>
All Known Implementing Classes:
RmiBindingInstantiationInterceptor
public interface Advice

Tag interface for Advice. Implementations can be any type of advice, such as Interceptors.
